price: Allah Yã la'ane shi. Kuma ya ce: "Lalle ne, zã ni riƙi rabõ yankakke,* daga bãyinKa.
arabic: لَّعَنَهُ ٱللَّهُۘ وَقَالَ لَأَتَّخِذَنَّ مِنۡ عِبَادِكَ نَصِيبٗا مَّفۡرُوضٗا
footnotes: * Rabon Shaiɗan daga kõwane dubu, shi ne ɗari tara da cas'in da tara kamar yadda aka ruwaito a cikin Hadĩsi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: laʿanahu al-lahu waqāla la-attakhidhanna min ʿibādika naṣīban mafrūḍan
